member.name: T:GenericModConfigMenu.IGenericModConfigMenuApi
member.summary: The API which lets other mods add a config ui through Generic Mod Config Menu.

member.name: M:GenericModConfigMenu.IGenericModConfigMenuApi.Register(StardewModdingAPI.IManifest,System.Action,System.Action,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Register a mod whose config can be edited through the ui.
member.param: The mod's manifest.
Reset the mod's config to its default values.
Save the mod's current config to the config.json file.
Whether the options can only be edited from the title screen.
member.remarks: Each mod can only be registered once, unless it's deleted via Unregister before calling this again.

member.name: M:GenericModConfigMenu.IGenericModConfigMenuApi.AddTextOption(StardewModdingAPI.IManifest,System.Func{System.String},System.Action{System.String},System.Func{System.String},System.Func{System.String},System.String[],System.Func{System.String,System.String},System.String)
member.summary: Add a string option at the current position in the form.
member.param: The mod's manifest.
Get the current value from the mod config.
Set a new value in the mod config.
The label text to show in the form.
The tooltip text shown when the cursor hovers on the field, or null to disable the tooltip.
The values that can be selected, or null to allow any.
Get the display text to show for a value from , or null to show the values as-is.
The unique field ID for use with OnFieldChanged, or null to auto-generate a randomized ID.

member.name: M:GenericModConfigMenu.IGenericModConfigMenuApi.AddKeybind(StardewModdingAPI.IManifest,System.Func{StardewModdingAPI.SButton},System.Action{StardewModdingAPI.SButton},System.Func{System.String},System.Func{System.String},System.String)
member.summary: Add a key binding at the current position in the form.

Get the current value from the mod config.
Set a new value in the mod config.
The label text to show in the form.
The tooltip text shown when the cursor hovers on the field, or null to disable the tooltip.
The unique field ID for use with OnFieldChanged, or null to auto-generate a randomized ID.

member.summary: Add an integer option at the current position in the form.
member.param: The mod's manifest.
Get the current value from the mod config.
Set a new value in the mod config.
The label text to show in the form.
The tooltip text shown when the cursor hovers on the field, or null to disable the tooltip.
The minimum allowed value, or null to allow any.
The maximum allowed value, or null to allow any.
The interval of values that can be selected.

The unique field ID for use with OnFieldChanged, or null to auto-generate a randomized ID.

member.name: T:ProfitCalculator.main.Calculator
member.summary: Class used to calculate the profits for crops. Contains all the settings for the calculator and the functions used to calculate the profits. Also contains the list of crops and the crop parsers. and , , , , are the main functions used to calculate the profits. and are the main functions used to retrieve the list of crops and crop infos.

member.name: F:ProfitCalculator.main.Calculator.crops
member.summary: List of all crops in the game

member.name: P:ProfitCalculator.main.Calculator.Day
member.summary: Day of the season

member.name: P:ProfitCalculator.main.Calculator.MaxDay
member.summary: Max days of a season

member.name: P:ProfitCalculator.main.Calculator.MinDay
member.summary: Min days of a season

member.name: P:ProfitCalculator.main.Calculator.Season
member.summary: Season of the year selected

member.name: P:ProfitCalculator.main.Calculator.ProduceType
member.summary: Type of produce selected TODO: Implement this.

member.name: P:ProfitCalculator.main.Calculator.FertilizerQuality
member.summary: Type of fertilizer selected

member.name: P:ProfitCalculator.main.Calculator.PayForSeeds
member.summary: Whether or not the player pays for seeds

member.name: P:ProfitCalculator.main.Calculator.PayForFertilizer
member.summary: Whether or not the player pays for fertilizer

member.name: P:ProfitCalculator.main.Calculator.MaxMoney
member.summary: Max money the player is willing to spend on seeds or fertilizer

member.name: P:ProfitCalculator.main.Calculator.UseBaseStats
member.summary: Whether or not to use base stats for the player or the current stats

member.name: P:ProfitCalculator.main.Calculator.CrossSeason
member.summary: Whether or not to calculate crops that are not available for the current season. If false, then crops that are not available for the current season will not be calculated. Not used.

member.name: P:ProfitCalculator.main.Calculator.FarmingLevel
member.summary: Current farming level of the player or 0 if using base stats, used for calculating crop quality chances

member.name: M:ProfitCalculator.main.Calculator.#ctor
member.summary: Constructor for the calculator, initializes the list of crops and crop parsers. Instantiates the calculator with default values.

member.name: M:ProfitCalculator.main.Calculator.SetSettings(System.UInt32,System.UInt32,System.UInt32,ProfitCalculator.Utils.Season,ProfitCalculator.Utils.ProduceType,ProfitCalculator.Utils.FertilizerQuality,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.UInt32,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets the settings for the calculator to use when calculating profits.

member.name: M:ProfitCalculator.main.Calculator.ClearCrops
member.summary: Clears the list of crops.

member.name: M:ProfitCalculator.main.Calculator.RetrieveCropsAsOrderderList
member.summary: Retrieves the list of crops as an ordered list by profit.
member.returns: List of crops ordered by profit

member.name: M:ProfitCalculator.main.Calculator.RetrieveCropInfos
member.summary: Retrieves the list of as an ordered list by profit.
member.returns: List of ordered by profit

member.name: M:ProfitCalculator.main.Calculator.RetrieveCropInfo(ProfitCalculator.main.Crop)
member.summary: Retrieves the for a specific crop. Uses information obtained by calling internal functions to calculate the values and build the object.
member.param: Crop to retrieve for
member.returns: for the crop

member.name: M:ProfitCalculator.main.Calculator.AddCrop(System.String,ProfitCalculator.main.Crop)
member.summary: Adds a crop to the list of crops.
member.param: Id of the crop
Crop to add

member.name: M:ProfitCalculator.main.Calculator.TotalCropProfit(ProfitCalculator.main.Crop)
member.summary: Calculates the total profit for a crop. See , , for more information.
member.param: Crop to calculate profit for
member.returns: Total profit for the crop

member.name: M:ProfitCalculator.main.Calculator.TotalCropProfitPerDay(ProfitCalculator.main.Crop)
member.summary: Calculates the total profit per day for a crop. See for more information. Simply devides the total profit by the total available days for the crop.
member.param: Crop to calculate profit per day for
member.returns: Total profit per day for the crop

member.name: M:ProfitCalculator.main.Calculator.TotalFertilizerNeeded(ProfitCalculator.main.Crop)
member.summary: Total fertilizer needed for a crop. If planted in greenhouse or if the crop only grows in one season, then only 1 fertilizer is needed. Otherwise, the total number of days the crop is available is divided by 28 and rounded up to get the total number of fertilizer needed.
member.param: Crop to calculate fertilizer needed for
member.returns: Total fertilizer needed for the crop

member.name: M:ProfitCalculator.main.Calculator.TotalFertilizerCost(ProfitCalculator.main.Crop)
member.summary: Total fertilizer cost for a crop. See and for more information.
member.param: Crop to calculate fertilizer cost for
member.returns: Total fertilizer cost for the crop

member.name: M:ProfitCalculator.main.Calculator.TotalFertilzerCostPerDay(ProfitCalculator.main.Crop)
member.summary: Total fertilizer cost per day for a crop. See for more information. Simply devides the total fertilizer cost by the total available days for the crop.
member.param: Crop to calculate fertilizer cost per day for
member.returns: Total fertilizer cost per day for the crop

member.name: M:ProfitCalculator.main.Calculator.TotalSeedsNeeded(ProfitCalculator.main.Crop)
member.summary: Total seeds needed for a crop. If the crop regrows, then only 1 seed is needed. Otherwise, the total number of harvests is calculated and multiplied by the number of seeds needed per harvest.
member.param: Crop to calculate seeds needed for
member.returns: Total seeds needed for the crop

member.name: M:ProfitCalculator.main.Calculator.TotalSeedsCost(ProfitCalculator.main.Crop)
member.summary: Total seeds cost for a crop. See and for more information.
member.param: Crop to calculate seeds cost for
member.returns: Total seeds cost for the crop

member.name: M:ProfitCalculator.main.Calculator.TotalSeedsCostPerDay(ProfitCalculator.main.Crop)
member.summary: Total seeds cost per day for a crop. See for more information. Simply devides the total seeds cost by the total available days for the crop.

member.name: M:ProfitCalculator.main.Calculator.PrintCropChanceTablesForAllFarmingLevels
member.summary: Prints the crop chance tables for all farming levels. Used for debugging.

member.name: M:ProfitCalculator.main.Calculator.PrintCropChanceTablesForAllFarmingLevelsAndFertilizerType
member.summary: Prints the crop chance tables for all farming levels and fertilizer types. Used for debugging.

member.name: M:ProfitCalculator.main.Calculator.GetAverageValueMultiplierForCrop
member.summary: Prints the average crop value modifier for current farming level and fertilizer type. Used for debugging. Uses , , , . and to calculate the average value modifier for the crop.
member.returns: Average crop value modifier for current farming level and fertilizer type

member.name: M:ProfitCalculator.main.Calculator.GetAverageValueForCropAfterModifiers
member.summary: Calculates the average crop value modifier applying relevant skill modifiers. See for more information.
member.returns: Average crop value modifier applying relevant skill modifiers

member.summary: Calculates the base chance for gold quality. See for more information.
member.param: Limit for the chance
member.returns: Base chance for gold quality

member.summary: Calculates the chance for normal quality. See for more information.
member.returns: Chance for normal quality

member.summary: Calculates the chance for silver quality. See for more information.

member.summary: Class Crop models a crop from the game storing all relevant information about it.

member.name: F:ProfitCalculator.main.Crop.seedPrice
member.value: Property seedPrice represents the seed buying price, used to calculate the seed purchasing loss and it's per day value.

member.name: F:ProfitCalculator.main.Crop.Id
member.value: Property Id represents the crop id AKA the slot in the sprite sheet.

member.name: F:ProfitCalculator.main.Crop.Item
member.value: Property Item represents the item object of the crop's produce.

member.name: F:ProfitCalculator.main.Crop.Name
member.value: Property Name represents the crop's name.

member.name: F:ProfitCalculator.main.Crop.Sprite
member.value: Property Sprite represents the crop's sprite. It's unused as of now.

member.name: F:ProfitCalculator.main.Crop.IsTrellisCrop
member.value: Property IsTrellisCrop represents whether the crop is a trellis crop or not.

member.name: F:ProfitCalculator.main.Crop.IsGiantCrop
member.value: Property IsGiantCrop represents whether the crop is a giant crop or not.

member.name: F:ProfitCalculator.main.Crop.GiantSprite
member.value: Property GiantSprite represents the giant crop's sprite. It's unused as of now.

member.name: F:ProfitCalculator.main.Crop.Seeds
member.value: Property Seeds represents the crop's seeds.

member.name: F:ProfitCalculator.main.Crop.Phases
member.value: Property Phases represents the crop's phases. It's unused as of now.

member.name: F:ProfitCalculator.main.Crop.Regrow
member.value: Property Regrow represents the crop's regrow time.

member.name: F:ProfitCalculator.main.Crop.IsPaddyCrop
member.value: Property IsPaddyCrop represents whether the crop is a paddy crop or not.

member.name: F:ProfitCalculator.main.Crop.Seasons
member.value: Property Seasons represents the crop's seasons.

member.name: F:ProfitCalculator.main.Crop.Days
member.value: Property Days represents the crop's total days to grow excluding .

member.name: F:ProfitCalculator.main.Crop.Price
member.value: Property Price represents the crop's selling price, not the same as

member.name: F:ProfitCalculator.main.Crop.ChanceForExtraCrops
member.value: Property ChanceForExtraCrops represents the crop's chance for extra crops.

member.name: F:ProfitCalculator.main.Crop.MaxHarvests
member.value: Property MaxHarvests represents the crop's maximum drops.

member.name: F:ProfitCalculator.main.Crop.MinHarvests
member.value: Property MinHarvests represents the crop's minimum drops.

member.name: F:ProfitCalculator.main.Crop.MaxHarvestIncreasePerFarmingLevel
member.value: Property MaxHarvestIncreasePerFarmingLevel represents the crop's maximum drops increase per farming level.

member.name: F:ProfitCalculator.main.Crop.affectByQuality
member.value: Property affectByQuality represents whether the crop is affected by fertilizer quality or not. Some crops like Tea aren't affected by this.

member.name: F:ProfitCalculator.main.Crop.affectByFertilizer
member.value: Property affectByFertilizer represents whether the crop is affected by fertilizer or not.

member.summary: Constructor for Crop class. It's used to create a new instance of the class.
member.param: ID of the crop's drop. AKA the slot in the sprite sheet.
Item object of the crop's produce.
Name of the crop.
Sprite of the crop. Unused as of now.
Whether the crop is a trellis crop or not.
Whether the crop is a giant crop or not.
Giant crop's sprite. Unused as of now.
Crop's seeds. Passed as array but converted to Immutable Array
Crop's phases. Passed as array but converted to Immutable Array
Crop's regrow time.
Whether the crop is a paddy crop or not.
Crop's seasons. Passed as array but converted to Immutable Array
Crop's harvest chance values. Passed as array of length 4 and converted to individual variables for ease of access.
Whether the crop is affected by fertilizer quality or not.
Whether the crop is affected by fertilizer or not.
Crop's seed buying price. If null, then it's calculated from the first seed in the seeds array. This is made for the override.

member.name: M:ProfitCalculator.main.Crop.GetSeedPrice
member.summary: Retrieves the seed buying price of the crop. Used to calculate the seed purchasing loss and it's per day value. If the seed price is not set, then it's calculated from the first seed in the seeds array. This is made for the override.
member.returns: Seed buying price of the crop. int

member.name: M:ProfitCalculator.main.Crop.Equals(System.Object)
member.summary: Returns whether two crops are equal or not. Two crops are equal if they have the same ID.
member.returns: Whether two crops are equal or not.

member.name: M:ProfitCalculator.main.Crop.ToString
member.summary: Returns a string representation of the crop.
member.returns: String representation of the crop.

member.name: M:ProfitCalculator.main.Crop.GetHashCode
member.summary: Returns the hash code of the crop.
member.returns: Hash code of the crop. int

member.name: M:ProfitCalculator.main.Crop.GetAverageGrowthSpeedValueForCrop(ProfitCalculator.Utils.FertilizerQuality)
member.summary: Calculates the average growth speed value for the crop. It's calculated by adding fertilizer modifiers to 1.0f and finally adding 0.25f if the crop is a paddy crop and 0.1f if the player has the agriculturist profession.
member.param: Quality of the used Fertilizer
member.returns: Average growth speed value for the crop. float

member.name: M:ProfitCalculator.main.Crop.IsAvailableForCurrentSeason(ProfitCalculator.Utils.Season)
member.summary: Checks whether the crop is available for the current season.
member.returns: Whether the crop is available for the current season or not.

member.name: M:ProfitCalculator.main.Crop.TotalAvailableDays(ProfitCalculator.Utils.Season,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the total available days for planting and harvesting the crop. Depends on which seasons the crop can grow.
member.param: Current season of type Season
Current day as int, can be from 0 to 1
member.returns: Total available days for planting and harvesting the crop. int

member.name: M:ProfitCalculator.main.Crop.TotalAvailableDaysInCurrentSeason(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the total available days for planting and harvesting the crop for the current season. Depends on which seasons the crop can grow.
member.param: Current day as int, can be from 0 to 1
member.returns: Total available days for planting and harvesting the crop in current season. int

member.name: M:ProfitCalculator.main.Crop.TotalHarvestsWithRemainingDays(ProfitCalculator.Utils.Season,ProfitCalculator.Utils.FertilizerQuality,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the total harvests for the crop for the available time. Depends on which seasons the crop can grow, the current day , and the fertilizer quality.
member.param: Current season of type Season
Quality of the used Fertilizer of type FertilizerQuality
Current day as int, can be from 0 to 1
member.returns: Total number of harvests for the crop for the available time. int

member.name: M:ProfitCalculator.main.Crop.ExtraCropsFromFarmingLevel
member.summary: How many extra crops can be harvested from the crop. Depends on farming level and extra per level defined. Currently Unused
member.returns: Number of extra crops that can be harvested from the crop. int

member.name: M:ProfitCalculator.main.Crop.AverageExtraCropsFromRandomness
member.summary: Meant to calculate the average extra crops from luck if any. Currently Unused
member.returns: Average extra crops from luck. double

member.name: T:ProfitCalculator.main.ICropParser
member.summary: Abstract class for parsing crop data from a file.

member.name: M:ProfitCalculator.main.ICropParser.BuildCrops
member.summary: Builds a dictionary of crops from a file or code.
member.returns: Dictionary of crops.

member.name: T:ProfitCalculator.main.VanillaCropParser
member.summary: Parses the vanilla crops from the game files. Also parses crops from the ManualCrops.json file.

member.name: M:ProfitCalculator.main.VanillaCropParser.#ctor
member.summary: Constructor for the VanillaCropParser class.

member.name: M:ProfitCalculator.main.VanillaCropParser.BuildCrops
member.summary: Builds a dictionary of crops from the game files. Accesses the crops from the game files (@"Data\Crops) and parses them into a dictionary.
member.returns: A dictionary of crops.

member.name: M:ProfitCalculator.main.VanillaCropParser.BuildCrop(System.String[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Builds a crop from the given data. The data is split by the '/' character. The data is then parsed into a crop. The crop is then returned. Thanks to Klhoe Leclair for this code.
member.param: The data of the crop.
The id of the crop.
member.returns: The crop that was built.

member.name: M:ProfitCalculator.main.VanillaCropParser.SeedPrice(System.String,System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.summary: Gets the seed price for the given seed id. If the seed id is not in the seedPriceOverrides dictionary, the seed price is returned. If the seed id is in the seedPriceOverrides dictionary, the seed price override is returned.
member.param: The id of the seed.
The current seed price of the crop.

member.name: M:ProfitCalculator.main.VanillaCropParser.BuildCropsFromJson
member.summary: Builds a dictionary of crops from the ManualCrops.json file. The crops are parsed from the json file and then added to a dictionary.
member.returns: A dictionary of crops.

member.name: M:ProfitCalculator.main.VanillaCropParser.BuildCropFromJson(System.String[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Builds a crop from the given data. The data is organized in an array. The data is then parsed into a crop. The crop is then returned.
member.param: The data of the crop.
The id of the crop.

member.name: T:ProfitCalculator.menus.ProfitCalculatorMainMenu
member.summary: The main menu for the profit calculator. This menu is opened by pressing the "F8" key by default. It is used to set the settings for the profit calculator. It is also used to open the results menu. This menu is the parent menu for the menu.

member.summary: The quality of fertilizer to use.

member.name: M:ProfitCalculator.menus.ProfitCalculatorMainMenu.draw(Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Graphics.SpriteBatch)
member.summary: Draws the menu. This method is called by the game. Options are drawn in SpriteSortMode.FrontToBack, Actions and Labels are drawn in SpriteSortMode.Deferred. This is done to prevent the options from being drawn over the actions and labels. Including dropdowns.
member.param: The spritebatch to draw with.

member.summary: Handles key presses received by the menu.
member.param: The key that was pressed.

The y position of the mouse.

member.summary: Handles mouse clicks received by the menu.
member.param: The x position of the mouse.
The y position of the mouse.
Whether to play a sound when the click is received.

member.name: M:ProfitCalculator.menus.ProfitCalculatorMainMenu.UpdateMenu
member.summary: Updates the menu. Refreshes the positions of the buttons and options.

member.name: M:ProfitCalculator.ui.DropdownOption.ReceiveScrollWheelAction(System.Int32)
member.summary: Reacts to the scroll wheel action. By showing the next or previous options if the dropdown is dropped and there are more options to show

member.name: M:ProfitCalculator.ui.DropdownOption.ReceiveLeftClick(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Action)
member.summary: Behaviour when the left click is received. If the dropdown is not dropped then open it. If it is dropped then close it. If dropdown was open and the click was meant to close it then close it it stops the spread of the click to other options so as to not get any overlap with other options (i.e. clicking on one option and opening another or selecting an option and opening another)
member.param: The x position of the mouse
The y position of the mouse
The action to stop the spread of the click
